title: Lygtens Kro
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pub in the Copenhagen Nordvest area, where you can enjoy German specialties, draft beer and music. Offers a vegan lunch platter with salad w/ beetroot; vege meatballs w/ pickles; roasted mushrooms and walnuts and vege pate with pickled onions served from 12:00 pm to 5:00 pm.  Serves a vegan bratwurst with fried potatoes, kraut and pickles from 12:00 pm to 10:00 pm every day.
